attributes.action: Comic relief funds raised to be raised for out flood victims
attributes.additional_details:
This petition has been started in Order to spread the word that comic relief should go ahead on the understanding that funds raised go to our victims here in the UK that have suffered due to the floods!!
I urge people to speak up for what's right and this country should be thought of first if the government should decide funds are still going to be deported abroad we should unite and not raise funds!!
